title: Looking for an expressive Swedish typeface!?
content:
Hi all,

I'm currently on the look out for an expressive swedish typeface for my uni project but as of yet am having little joy finding one!  
Would welcome any suggestions!

Thanks
author: spittman

comments.content:
Nothing expressive enough for you here?  
 [http://lettersfromsweden.se/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416142623/http:/lettersfromsweden.se/ "http://lettersfromsweden.se/")
